channel.title: [bug] How to break an elevator [Fixed]
channel.description:
First, here's the required info:
Map: bm_c1a1a at: 1319 x, 1808 y, -448 z
Pos: 1319.504272 1808.179565 -448.468750;setang 11.261879 -95.059372 0.000000
What went wrong: This is the first elevator after the main incident.. if you get onboard, and activate it, but are partially off the elevator while it lifts, you will take -1 point of damage and the elevator will lower back down and you will not be able to activate it again. Only way to continue is to reload from earlier save.

item.title: [bug] How to break an elevator [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: robot_deodorant
item.description:
First, here’s the required info:

Map: bm_c1a1a at: 1319 x, 1808 y, -448 z

Pos: 1319.504272 1808.179565 -448.468750;setang 11.261879 -95.059372 0.000000

What went wrong:
This is the first elevator after the main incident… if you get onboard, and activate it, but are partially off the elevator while it lifts, you will take -1 point of damage and the elevator will lower back down and you will not be able to activate it again. Only way to continue is to reload from earlier save.
